pkgmetadata.longdescription: Individual Based Model Population Simulation // Simulation of the random evolution of structured population dynamics, called stochastic Individual Based Models (IBMs) (see e.g. Ferrire and Tran (2009) doi:10.1051/proc/2009033, Bansaye and Mlard (2015) doi:10.1007/978-3-319-21711-6, Boumezoued (2016)). The package allows users to simulate the random evolution of a population in which individuals are characterised by their date of birth, a set of attributes, and their potential date of death.
